artist: Painter: After Guido Reni; Draftsman: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Antonio Marchi
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

Below image in black: Guido Reni dip.  F. Rosaspina dis.  A Marchi inc. / LA CORONAZIONE DI MARIA VERGINE / E LI S. GIOVANNI BATTA, GIOVANNI EVANGELISTA, BENEDETTO, E CATERINA | on sheet in pencil:  2-281
title: The Coronation of the Virgin Mary with Saints John the Baptist, John the Evangelist, Benedict and Catherine
